column5: (ID Units:  SF: ) A well-known value 122.  Uniquely identifies this as a SunSpec Measurements_Status Model - Range: 122
(L Units: Registers SF: ) Length of Measurements_Status Model - Range: 44
(PVConn Units:  SF: ) PV inverter present/available status. Enumerated value. - Range: Bit 0: Connected Bit 1: Available Bit 2: Operating Bit 3: Test
(StorConn Units:  SF: ) Storage inverter present/available status. Enumerated value. - Range: bit 0: CONNECTED bit 1: AVAILABLE bit 2: OPERATING bit 3: TEST
(ECPConn Units:  SF: ) ECP connection status: disconnected=0  connected=1. - Range: 0: Disconnected 1: Connected
(ActWh Units: Wh SF: ) AC lifetime active (real) energy output. - Range:
(ActVAh Units: VAh SF: ) AC lifetime apparent energy output. - Range: Not supported
(ActVArhQ1 Units: varh SF: ) AC lifetime reactive energy output in quadrant 1. - Range: Not supported
(ActVArhQ2 Units: varh SF: ) AC lifetime reactive energy output in quadrant 2. - Range: Not supported
(ActVArhQ3 Units: varh SF: ) AC lifetime negative energy output  in quadrant 3. - Range: Not supported
(ActVArhQ4 Units: varh SF: ) AC lifetime reactive energy output  in quadrant 4. - Range: Not supported
(VArAval Units: var SF: VArAval_SF) Amount of VARs available without impacting watts output. - Range: Not supported
(VArAval_SF Units:  SF: ) Scale factor for available VARs. - Range: Not supported
(WAval Units: W SF: WAval_SF) Amount of Watts available. - Range: Not supported
(WAval_SF Units:  SF: ) Scale factor for available Watts. - Range: Not supported
(StSetLimMsk Units:  SF: ) Bit Mask indicating setpoint limit(s) reached. Bits are persistent and must be cleared by the controller. - Range: Not supported
(StActCtl Units:  SF: ) Bit Mask indicating which inverter controls are currently active. - Range: Bit 0: FixedW Bit 1: FixedVAR Bit 2: FixedPF
(TmSrc Units:  SF: ) Source of time synchronization. - Range: RTC
(Tms Units: Secs SF: ) Seconds since 01-01-2000 00:00 UTC - Range:
(RtSt Units:  SF: ) Bit Mask indicating which voltage ride through modes are currently active. - Range: Not supported
(Riso Units: Ohm SF: Riso_SF) Isolation resistance - Range:
(Riso_SF Units:  SF: ) Scale factor for Isolation resistance - Range:
